attributes.action: Open up debate to merge The Irish Football Association (IFA) with The Football Association of Ireland (FAI), ignoring politics for sport.
attributes.additional_details: An all Ireland National Team would help a great sport thrive & also help the economies of both North & South. Whether British Irish or Republican Irish we're all Irish & want to do better in the biggest football competitions. Creating a more competitive all Ireland league would help the players grow & also draw larger crowds.
